articles.author: Bilal Kuchay
articles.title: Homes destroyed and 1,500 detained in Kashmir as India cracks down following attacks - NPR
articles.description: Indian authorities have detained at least 1,500 people in India-administered Kashmir after a militant attack killed 26 people this past week, a top police officer told NPR.
articles.content: PULWAMA, India Indian authorities have detained at least 1,500 people in India-administered Kashmir after a militant attack killed 26 people last week, a top police officer told NPR. Several homes li… [+4747 chars]
